ygData.subject: Sugar Daddy Sparx
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, on the Mithaniel Marr server, I was hunting in BB and found a gnoll brewer, which was blue to me. Hehe, I knew the story behind those rare-spawns so a
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, on the Mithaniel Marr server, I was hunting
in BB and found a gnoll brewer, which was blue to
me. Hehe, I knew the story behind those rare-spawns
so a killed it! To my luck I found a BB cask on it,
which I still didn't know hoe to do the BBstout quest
yet. So...I figured I could find out later! The next
day someone said over the zone that he wanted to buy
the BBcask desparately! So I asked how much you
willing to pay? He said A WHOPPING 100PP (fairly good for
a lvl 13 bard hehe) So I said fine! Sold it! Got my
money! Then BOOM! I was rich! Also that same day I
recieved a Chitin Shield, a PGT, and elf-hide gloves, all
absolutely FREE! =) Oh my, what a day lol!
